name: SubmitterRole
label: Submitter Role
description: Role of the Submitter (e.g. Oncologist in charge of the patient, Research Project PI). (FG:0000752)

name: DataCenter
label: Data Center
description: Refers to the Department in charge of Data Production and/ or analysis (FG:0000753)

name: ClinicalCenter
label: Clinical Center
description: Refers to the Clinical Department in charge of the patient. (FG:0000754)

name: PublicationDescription
label: Publication description
description: Linked to the instance of publication_doi; should provide a human-readably description of the publication. (FG:0000757)

name: Collection
label: Collection
description: Identifies collection (Biobank, Collection, Cohort, other types of projects) in which data are part of. (FG:0000751)
